text: Ezɨ gumazir dapanir kaba uari akuvagha Moses ko Aron bagha ghua ghaze, “Gua oragh! E Israelian gumazamiziba bar, e vaghvagha Ikiavɨra Itir God baghavɨra itir gumazamiziba, ezɨ a bar en tongɨn iti. Ezɨ gua uaning fa ifaghata ghaze, gua ti Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn gumazir igharaziba bar me gafira. Manmaghsua gua ghaze, guarara bar e gativagham? Guan arazir kam, bar derazir puvatɨ.”
